*   [API edna Chat Center](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#)

*   API edna Chat Center
*   Агенты
*   Получить список навыков агентов

On this page

Получить список навыков агентов
===============================

Используйте этот метод, чтобы вернуть список навыков агентов.

`----    Permissions:INTEGRATOR,SUPERVISOR,OPERATOR,BOT    ----`

Пример curl[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-curl "Direct link to Пример curl")
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/agents/skills' -i -X GET \    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \    -H 'Authorization: Bearer <integrator_token>' \    -H 'X-Tenant-Name: local'`

Пример HTTP запроса[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример HTTP запроса")
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`GET /api/v1/agents/skills HTTP/1.1Content-Type: application/jsonAuthorization: Bearer <integrator_token>X-Tenant-Name: localHost: localhost:8080`

Пример HTTP ответа[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример HTTP ответа")
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`HTTP/1.1 200 OKX-Request-Id: bb935883-ce98-42cd-a41b-a48e155c62ebVary: OriginVary: Access-Control-Request-MethodVary: Access-Control-Request-HeadersContent-Type: application/jsonX-Content-Type-Options: nosniffX-XSS-Protection: 0Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidatePragma: no-cacheExpires: 0X-Frame-Options: DENYContent-Length: 199[ {  "id" : 1,  "name" : "loans", {  "id" : 2,  "name" : "deposits", {  "id" : 3,  "name" : "cards", {  "id" : 4,  "name" : "insurance", {  "id" : 5,  "name" : "remote services" ]`

Поля тела ответа[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8F-%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0 "Direct link to Поля тела ответа")
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

| Параметр | Тип | Описание |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `[].id` | `Long` | Идентификатор навыка |
| `[].name` | `String` | Имя навыка |

[Previous Установить статус агента](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/set-agent-status)[Next Разлогинить агента](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/logout)

*   [Пример curl](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-curl)
*   [Пример HTTP запроса](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0)
*   [Пример HTTP ответа](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0)
*   [Поля тела ответа](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8F-%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0)

[![Image 4](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/img/logo-footer.svg)](https://edna.ru/)

Copyright © 2025 edna

`$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/agents/skills' -i -X GET \    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \    -H 'Authorization: Bearer <integrator_token>' \    -H 'X-Tenant-Name: local'`

Пример HTTP запроса[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример HTTP запроса")
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`GET /api/v1/agents/skills HTTP/1.1Content-Type: application/jsonAuthorization: Bearer <integrator_token>X-Tenant-Name: localHost: localhost:8080`

Пример HTTP ответа[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример HTTP ответа")
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`HTTP/1.1 200 OKX-Request-Id: bb935883-ce98-42cd-a41b-a48e155c62ebVary: OriginVary: Access-Control-Request-MethodVary: Access-Control-Request-HeadersContent-Type: application/jsonX-Content-Type-Options: nosniffX-XSS-Protection: 0Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidatePragma: no-cacheExpires: 0X-Frame-Options: DENYContent-Length: 199[ {  "id" : 1,  "name" : "loans", {  "id" : 2,  "name" : "deposits", {  "id" : 3,  "name" : "cards", {  "id" : 4,  "name" : "insurance", {  "id" : 5,  "name" : "remote services" ]`

Поля тела ответа[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8F-%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0 "Direct link to Поля тела ответа")
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

| Параметр | Тип | Описание |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `[].id` | `Long` | Идентификатор навыка |
| `[].name` | `String` | Имя навыка |

[Previous Установить статус агента](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/set-agent-status)[Next Разлогинить агента](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/logout)

*   [Пример curl](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-curl)
*   [Пример HTTP запроса](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0)
*   [Пример HTTP ответа](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0)
*   [Поля тела ответа](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8F-%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0)

Получить список навыков агентов
===============================

Используйте этот метод, чтобы вернуть список навыков агентов.

`----    Permissions:INTEGRATOR,SUPERVISOR,OPERATOR,BOT    ----`

Пример curl[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-curl "Direct link to Пример curl")
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`$ curl 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/agents/skills' -i -X GET \    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \    -H 'Authorization: Bearer <integrator_token>' \    -H 'X-Tenant-Name: local'`

Пример HTTP запроса[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример HTTP запроса")
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`GET /api/v1/agents/skills HTTP/1.1Content-Type: application/jsonAuthorization: Bearer <integrator_token>X-Tenant-Name: localHost: localhost:8080`

Пример HTTP ответа[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%80-http-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0 "Direct link to Пример HTTP ответа")
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

`HTTP/1.1 200 OKX-Request-Id: bb935883-ce98-42cd-a41b-a48e155c62ebVary: OriginVary: Access-Control-Request-MethodVary: Access-Control-Request-HeadersContent-Type: application/jsonX-Content-Type-Options: nosniffX-XSS-Protection: 0Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidatePragma: no-cacheExpires: 0X-Frame-Options: DENYContent-Length: 199[ {  "id" : 1,  "name" : "loans", {  "id" : 2,  "name" : "deposits", {  "id" : 3,  "name" : "cards", {  "id" : 4,  "name" : "insurance", {  "id" : 5,  "name" : "remote services" ]`

Поля тела ответа[​](http://docs-chatcenter.edna.ru/docs/api/external-api/agents/get-agent-skills#%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8F-%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0 "Direct link to Поля тела ответа")
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

| Параметр | Тип | Описание |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `[].id` | `Long` | Идентификатор навыка |
| `[].name` | `String` | Имя навыка |
